publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2512 Mr Gil Paterson: Breaking the Organised Child Sex Ringsâ€”That the Parliament recognises that well organised and financed people are systematically abusing children in the sex trade using games, alcohol and drugs to groom and coerce children into sex rings who are then exploited, degraded and abused by paedophile adults for money and calls on the Scottish Executive to resource the police to allow them to set up a task force to combat child abuse in the sex trade, tackle the provision of children for sex and paying for sex with children by adults and target crimes against children on the internet in order to ensure a course of action is followed that will break organised child sex rings and bring the perpetrators of child sex abuse to justice.
S1M-2512 Breaking the Organised Child Sex Rings (lodged on 3 December 2001) Mr Andrew Welsh*, Michael Matheson*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Mr Adam Ingram*

S1M-2512 Breaking the Organised Child Sex Rings (lodged on 3 December 2001) Fergus Ewing*, Stewart Stevenson*, Kay Ullrich*, Fiona McLeod*, Brian Adam*, Ms Margo MacDonald*, Ms Sandra White*, Dr Winnie Ewing*, Alex Fergusson*, Richard Lochhead*
S1M-2512 Breaking the Organised Child Sex Rings (lodged on 3 December 2001) Dennis Canavan*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*

S1M-2512 Mr Gil Paterson: Breaking the Organised Child Sex Rings-That the Parliament recognises that well organised and financed people are systematically abusing children in the sex trade using games, alcohol and drugs to groom and coerce children into sex rings who are then exploited, degraded and abused by paedophile adults for money and calls on the Scottish Executive to resource the police to allow them to set up a task force to combat child abuse in the sex trade, tackle the provision of children for sex and paying for sex with children by adults and target crimes against children on the internet in order to ensure a course of action is followed that will break organised child sex rings and bring the perpetrators of child sex abuse to justice. Supported by: Mr Andrew Welsh, Michael Matheson, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Mr Adam Ingram, Fergus Ewing, Stewart Stevenson, Kay Ullrich, Fiona McLeod, Brian Adam, Ms Margo MacDonald, Ms Sandra White, Dr Winnie Ewing, Alex Fergusson, Richard Lochhead, Dennis Canavan, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Donald Gorrie*
S1M-2512 Breaking the Organised Child Sex Rings (lodged on 3 December 2001) Christine Grahame*
S1M-2512 Breaking the Organised Child Sex Rings (lodged on 3 December 2001) Dorothy-Grace Elder*, Alex Neil*, Linda Fabiani*
S1M-2512 Breaking the Organised Child Sex Rings (lodged on 3 December 2001) Mary Scanlon*
S1M-2512 Breaking the Organised Child Sex Rings (lodged on 3 December 2001) Mr Duncan Hamilton*
S1M-2512 Breaking the Organised Child Sex Rings (lodged on 3 December 2001) Colin Campbell*
S1M-2512 Breaking the Organised Child Sex Rings (lodged on 3 December 2001) Mrs Margaret Ewing*
S1M-2512 Breaking the Organised Child Sex Rings (lodged on 3 December 2001) Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh*
